item.description:
The air is crisp and the leaves are starting to change. If you'd like to visit the club and check out what the White Mountains and North Conway has to offer in the fall, this is a great weekend. This meetup starts Friday, October 9th and ends Monday, October 12th . The Brettl-Hupfers will be up at our lodge in Bartlett, NH and guests are welcome for $20 per night guest fees. There's a BBQ on Saturday afternoon down the road, and a little dancing to DJ Chris schedueld Saturday evening at the club. Full details and information will be sent to all Yes RSVPs.

All members and guests must be 21+

Hope to see you up!
item.name: Columbus Day Weekend
